author: Moscato Mom
title: Cheesy Keto Sausage Balls
instructions_list: Using your hands, mix all ingredients together in a large bowl.
Using a spoon, scoop out mixture and roll in to 1" balls.
Place on a parchment paper or foiled cookie sheet about 1" apart.
Bake at 350* for about 15 minutes or until done throughout. Tops will start to brown and look dry.
description: Your favorite sausage balls - without all of the carbs! These Cheesy Keto Sausage Balls are a crowd favorite. Made without any nut flours, these low carb sausage balls have tons of flavor with only 1 carb per ball!
